mapper.sql: otid, eid, startdate, enddate, time, method, islegalholiday, reason, approver, note, state, result, progress
mapper.insert:
insert into overtime
otid,
eid,
startdate,
enddate,
time,
method,
islegalholiday,
reason,
approver,
note,
state,

mapper.update:
update overtime
eid = #{eid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
startdate = #{startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enddate = #{enddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
time = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER},
method = #{method,jdbcType=INTEGER},
islegalholiday = #{islegalholiday,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reason = #{reason},
approver = #{approver,jdbcType=BIGINT},
note = #{note},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER},
progress = #{progress,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where otid = #{otid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update overtime set eid = #{eid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, startdate = #{startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enddate = #{enddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, time = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, method = #{method,jdbcType=INTEGER}, islegalholiday = #{islegalholiday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reason = #{reason}, approver = #{approver,jdbcType=BIGINT}, note = #{note}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, progress = #{progress,jdbcType=INTEGER} where otid = #{otid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
